entry.title: mytest_error_review
entry.summary:
error1: ssh generate by bash, but not wrok. ->ssh _rsa.pub gedit cp to the github website manually

error2: "ascii" code problem ->import sys reload sys sys.setdefaultencoding("utf-8") ->because ubuntu is zh. '中文' is ascii-encode

error3: git command: git push ->git init ->git remote add origin https://github.com/username/username.github.com.git #lik the remote depository ->git pull ->git add . ->git commit -m 'my commit' ->git push origin master # behind if push get errors, you need to force push: $ git push origin +master
